data.text:
Jake Speed on DVD

When her sister is kidnapped by white slavers, only Grandpa knows what to do. He puts in a call to a fictional hero, Jake Speed. She is amazed to find that he actually exists, and that as flesh and blood, is much less formidable than his reputation.

Cast:

Wayne Crawford ... Jake Speed

Dennis Christopher ... Desmond Floyd

Karen Kopins ... Margaret Winston

John Hurt ... Sid

Details

Country: USA

Language: English

Release Date: 30 May 1986 (USA)

Runtime: 100 min

Sound Mix: Ultra Stereo

Color: Color (Technicolor)

Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1
